plot: Documentary short film explaining the need for increased production of war materials such as artillery shells and bullets as the pace of the Allied war effort increases.
title: The War Speeds Up
plot_es: Documentary short film explaining the need for increased production of war materials such as artillery shells and bullets as the pace of the Allied war effort increases.
plot_en: Documentary short film explaining the need for increased production of war materials such as artillery shells and bullets as the pace of the Allied war effort increases.
